text: Judgment Night is a 1993 American action thriller movie directed by Stephen Hopkins and starring Emilio Estevez, Cuba Gooding Jr., Denis Leary, Stephen Dorff, Jeremy Piven. It was distributed by Universal Pictures. == Other websites == * * Category:1993 action movies Category:1993 thriller movies Category:1990s action thriller movies Category:American action thriller movies Category:Movies directed by Stephen Hopkins Category:Universal Pictures movies
title: Judgment Night
